sourcesContent:
"use client" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import jsPDF from "jspdf" import "jspdf-autotable" const Invoices = () => { const [batchSlips, setBatchSlips] = useState([]) const [selectedInvoice, setSelectedInvoice] = useState(null) const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { // Load batch slips from localStorage const savedBatchSlips = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("batchSlips") || "[]") setBatchSlips(savedBatchSlips) // Set the latest batch slip as selected invoice if (savedBatchSlips.length > 0) { setSelectedInvoice(savedBatchSlips[savedBatchSlips.length - 1]) } }, []) const generateInvoicePDF = (invoice) => { const doc = new jsPDF() // Header doc.setFontSize(16) doc.setFont(undefined, "bold") doc.text("RR CONSTRUCTIONS", 20, 20) doc.text("Tax Invoice", 150, 20) doc.setFontSize(10) doc.setFont(undefined, "normal") doc.text("GSTIN: 33AAGFT4474P1Z1", 20, 30) doc.text(`Invoice No: ${invoice.invoiceNumber}`, 150, 30) doc.text("Excel College Campus, NH 91, Mathura", 20, 35) doc.text(`Date: ${new Date(invoice.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()}`, 150, 35) doc.text("Road, Haryana - 121102", 20, 40) doc.text(`Batch Number: ${invoice.batchNumber}`, 150, 40) doc.text("GST/NSN: 33AAGFT4474P1Z1", 20, 45) doc.text("Terms of Delivery: As per Order &", 150, 45) doc.text("Biller: INFRA LP", 20, 50) doc.text("Cheque", 150, 50) doc.text("State Name: Tamil Nadu, India", 20, 55) // Bill To section doc.setFont(undefined, "bold") doc.text("Bill To:", 20, 70) doc.text("Dispatch Site:", 150, 70) doc.setFont(undefined, "normal") doc.text(invoice.clientName, 20, 80) doc.text("N/A", 150, 80) doc.text(invoice.clientAddress, 20, 85) doc.text("Bill of Lading/Ref No: N/A", 150, 85) doc.text(`GSTIN: ${invoice.clientGSTIN || "N/A"}`, 20, 90) // Table const tableData = [ [invoice.description, invoice.hsn, invoice.quantity, `₹${invoice.rate}`, invoice.unit, `₹${invoice.total}`], ] doc.autoTable({ startY: 100, head: [["Description", "HSN", "Quantity", "Rate", "Per", "Amount"]], body: tableData, theme: "grid", }) // Totals const finalY = doc.lastAutoTable.finalY + 10 doc.text(`Total: ₹${invoice.total}`, 150, finalY) doc.text(`Output-CGST @ 9%: ₹${invoice.cgst}`, 150, finalY + 10) doc.text(`Output-SGST @ 9%: ₹${invoice.sgst}`, 150, finalY + 20) doc.setFont(undefined, "bold") doc.text(`Grand Total: ₹${invoice.grandTotal}`, 150, finalY + 30) // Amount in words doc.setFont(undefined, "normal") doc.text(`Amount Chargeable (in words): ${invoice.amountInWords}`, 20, finalY + 50) // Footer doc.text("Subject to the Tirupati Jurisdiction", 20, finalY + 70) doc.text("This is a Computer Generated Invoice", 150, finalY + 70) doc.text("Authorised Signatory", 20, finalY + 80) return doc } const generateBatchSlipPDF = (batchSlip) => { const doc = new jsPDF() // Header doc.setFontSize(16) doc.setFont(undefined, "bold") doc.text("RR CONSTRUCTIONS", 105, 20, { align: "center" }) doc.setFontSize(10) doc.setFont(undefined, "normal") doc.text("MCI 70 Control System Ver 3.1", 105, 30, { align: "center" }) doc.text("SCHWING Stetter", 105, 35, { align: "center" }) // Batch details doc.setFont(undefined, "bold") doc.text("Docket / Batch Report / Autographic Record", 20, 50) doc.text(`Plant Serial Number: ${batchSlip.plantSerialNumber}`, 150, 50) doc.setFont(undefined, "normal") doc.text(`Batch Date: ${batchSlip.batchDate}`, 20, 60) doc.text(`Ordered Quantity: ${batchSlip.orderedQuantity} M³`, 150, 60) doc.text(`Batch Start Time: ${batchSlip.batchStartTime}`, 20, 65) doc.text(`Production Quantity: ${batchSlip.productionQuantity} M³`, 150, 65) doc.text(`Batch End Time: ${batchSlip.batchEndTime}`, 20, 70) doc.text(`Adj/Manual Quantity: ${batchSlip.adjManualQuantity} M³`, 150, 70) doc.text(`Batch Number: ${batchSlip.batchNumber}`, 20, 75) doc.text(`With This Load: ${batchSlip.withThisLoad} M³`, 150, 75) doc.text(`Customer: ${batchSlip.customer}`, 20, 80) doc.text(`Mixer Capacity: ${batchSlip.mixerCapacity} M³`, 150, 80) doc.text(`Site: ${batchSlip.site}`, 20, 85) doc.text(`Batch Size: ${batchSlip.batchSize} M³`, 150, 85) doc.text(`Recipe Code: ${batchSlip.recipeCode}`, 20, 90) doc.text(`Recipe Name: ${batchSlip.recipeName}`, 20, 95) doc.text(`Truck Number: ${batchSlip.truckNumber}`, 20, 100) doc.text(`Truck Driver: ${batchSlip.truckDriver}`, 20, 105) doc.text(`Order Number: ${batchSlip.orderNumber}`, 20, 110) doc.text(`Batcher Name: ${batchSlip.batcherName}`, 20, 115) // Material table (simplified) const materialHeaders = [ "Batch Size in M³", "SAND", "40 MM", "20 MM", "0", "CEM-1", "CEM-2", "CEM-3", "WATER", "ADMIX1", ] const materialData = batchSlip.materialData .slice(0, 5) .map((row, index) => [ `${index + 1}`, row.sand, row.mm40, row.mm20, row.mm0, row.cem1, row.cem2, row.cem3, row.water, row.admix1, ]) doc.autoTable({ startY: 125, head: [materialHeaders], body: materialData, theme: "grid", styles: { fontSize: 8 }, }) // Totals const finalY = doc.lastAutoTable.finalY + 5 doc.autoTable({ startY: finalY, head: [["Total Set Weight", "SAND", "40 MM", "20 MM", "0", "CEM-1", "CEM-2", "CEM-3", "WATER", "ADMIX1"]], body: [ [ "Total", batchSlip.totalSand, batchSlip.totalMm40, batchSlip.totalMm20, "0.00", batchSlip.totalCem1, batchSlip.totalCem2, batchSlip.totalCem3, batchSlip.totalWater, batchSlip.totalAdmix1, ], ], theme: "grid", styles: { fontSize: 8 }, }) doc.text(`Batcher Name: ${batchSlip.batcherName}`, 20, doc.lastAutoTable.finalY + 15) return doc } const downloadInvoice = () => { if (selectedInvoice) { const doc = generateInvoicePDF(selectedInvoice) doc.save(`Invoice_${selectedInvoice.invoiceNumber}.pdf`) } } const downloadBatchSlip = (batchSlip) => { const doc = generateBatchSlipPDF(batchSlip) doc.save(`BatchSlip_${batchSlip.batchNumber}.pdf`) } const viewInvoice = () => { setShowModal(true) } const sendBatchSlip = (batchSlip) => { console.log("Sending batch slip:", batchSlip) alert(`Batch slip ${batchSlip.batchNumber} sent to ${batchSlip.clientEmail}`) } const viewBatchSlip = (batchSlip) => { alert(`Viewing batch slip details for ${batchSlip.batchNumber}`) } return (
🧾

Invoices

{index + 1} {batchSlip.batchNumber} {batchSlip.batchDate} {batchSlip.customer} {batchSlip.recipeCode} {batchSlip.quantity} {batchSlip.clientEmail} {batchSlip.clientAddress}
{batchSlips.length === 0 && (

No batch slips found. Create a batch slip to see invoices here.

)}

setShowModal(false)}>
e.stopPropagation()}>

Invoice Preview

)}
) } export default Invoices
